author: Nostalgia Nerd
description:
Densha de Go!; the Japanese train game so precise that real drivers used the arcade cabinet for practice. A PS1 classic that never left Japan; complete with dedicated train-handle controllers; brutal accuracy; and the tiny cup holder everyone remembers. If you’ve never seen this series in action; here’s why it became a national obsession. 
#denshadego #ps1 #retrogaming #japan #arcade #taito
title: Train Game So Accurate Real Drivers Used It
